nodes.text: Rawwks were a blue-and-red tipped species of animal native to the gas giant Bespin. They lived amongst "trees" of algae that grew in the upper atmosphere of the planet, and preyed upon air shrimp.

Rawwks were first created by Kevin J. Anderson for the Star Wars Legends novel Jedi Search, which was published in 1994. The species was confirmed to be canon in the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
